text: Tyrus Wong (; October 25, 1910 - December 30, 2016) was a Chinese-born American artist. He was a painter, muralist, ceramicist, lithographer, designer and kite maker. Wong has worked for Disney and Warner Brothers. Wong's most famous work was for the Disney animated classic, Bambi. ==Other websites== *A Profile of Tyrus Wong by Rosalind Chang. Angel Island Immigration Station Foundation. *Tyrus Wong. Disney Legend Disney Insider.
